description: This file is an HTML document for a web-based database viewer interface. It includes structure, styles, and client-side scripts to browse databases, tables, and view table data with features like refresh, expand cells, and responsive layout.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from API and populates sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, reloading data from server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show/hide tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads the data for the selected table and displays it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML table structure from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates a table cell HTML based on the data type and content size.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content on click for long or object data.
